Default: 20, Minimum: 1\\n;versions_to_keep = 20\\n\\n#################################### Users ###############################\\n[users]\\n# disable user signup / registration\\n;allow_sign_up = true\\n\\n# Allow non admin users to create organizations\\n;allow_org_create = true\\n\\n# Set to true to automatically assign new users to the default organization (id 1)\\n;auto_assign_org = true\\n\\n# Default role new users will be automatically assigned (if disabled above is set to true)\\n;auto_assign_org_role = Viewer\\n\\n# Background text for the user field on the login page\\n;login_hint = email or username\\n\\n# Default UI theme (\\\"dark\\\" or \\\"light\\\")\\n;default_theme = dark\\n\\n# External user management, these options affect the organization users view\\n;external_manage_link_url =\\n;external_manage_link_name =\\n;external_manage_info =\\n\\n# Viewers can edit/inspect dashboard settings in the browser. const\\n# jaeger samplerconfig param\\n# for \\\"const\\\" sampler, 0 or 1 for always false/true respectively\\n# for \\\"probabilistic\\\" sampler, a probability between 0 and 1\\n# for \\\"rateLimiting\\\" sampler, the number of spans per second\\n# for \\\"remote\\\" sampler, param is the same as for \\\"probabilistic\\\"\\n# and indicates the initial sampling rate before the != 0 ]; then\n        echo \"Error: Failed to apply changes to config file\"\n        exit 1\n    fi\n    \n    DOMAIN=`hostname -d`\n\n    if [ -n \"${ZOOKEEPER_DOMAIN}\" ]; then\n        ZOOKEEPER_DOMAIN=\"${ZOOKEEPER_DOMAIN}.$(cut -d '.' -f 2- <<<${DOMAIN})\"\n    else\n        ZOOKEEPER_DOMAIN=$DOMAIN\n    fi\n    \n    # Generate list of servers and detect the current server ID,\n    # based on the hostname\n    ((IDX++))\n    for SERVER in $(echo $ZOOKEEPER_SERVERS | tr \",\" \"\\n\")\n    do\n        echo \"server.$IDX=$SERVER.$ZOOKEEPER_DOMAIN:2888:3888:${PEER_TYPE};2181\" >> $CONF_FILE\n    \n        if [ \"$HOSTNAME\" == \"$SERVER\" ]; then\n            MY_ID=$IDX\n            echo \"Current server id $MY_ID\"\n        fi\n    \n    \t((IDX++))\n    done\n\n    if [ -n \"${OBSERVER_SERVER}\" ]; then\n        echo \"server.$IDX=${OBSERVER_SERVER}.$DOMAIN:2181:2888:observer\" >> $CONF_FILE\n        MY_ID=$IDX\n    fi\n\n    # For ZooKeeper container we need to initialize the ZK id\n    if [ ! -z \"$MY_ID\" ]; then\n        # Get ZK data dir\n        DATA_DIR=`grep '^dataDir=' $CONF_FILE | awk -F= '{print $2}'`\n        if [ ! -e $DATA_DIR/myid ]; then\n            echo \"Creating $DATA_DIR/myid with id = $MY_ID\"\n            mkdir -p $DATA_DIR\n            echo $MY_ID > $DATA_DIR/myid\n        fi\n    fi\n---\n# Source: pulsar/templates/pulsar-manager/pulsar-manager-pvc.yaml\n#\n# Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one\n# or more contributor license agreements.
